mil3.5.5:1.2: “bhante nagasena, na ca sankamati patisandahati ca”ti?
mil3.5.5:1.3: “Ama, maharaja, na ca sankamati patisandahati ca”ti.
mil3.5.5:1.4: “Katham, bhante nagasena, na ca sankamati patisandahati ca, opammam karohi”ti?
mil3.5.5:1.5: “Yatha, maharaja, kocideva puriso padipato padipam padipeyya, kim nu kho so, maharaja, padipo padipamha sankanto”ti?
mil3.5.5:1.7: “Evameva kho, maharaja, na ca sankamati patisandahati ca”ti.
mil3.5.5:2.2: “Abhijanasi nu tvam, maharaja, daharako santo silokacariyassa santike kinci silokam gahitan”ti?
mil3.5.5:2.4: “Kim nu kho, maharaja, so siloko acariyamha sankanto”ti?
mil3.5.5:2.6: “Evameva kho, maharaja, na ca sankamati patisandahati ca”ti.
